elements.name: As a user, I should be able to edit my profile information

steps.name: user has completed the onboarding steps and left notification enabled by default
user tap Profile on navigation bar
user tap Change to edit photo profile
user redirected to the profile page

elements.name: As a user, I should receive alert if navigate back without saving edited profile information

steps.name: user has completed the onboarding steps and left notification enabled by default
user tap Profile on navigation bar
user tap Change to edit photo profile
display the alert message with text "You have modified your profile data. Are you sure you want to go back without saving the changes?"

arguments.val: "You have modified your profile data. Are you sure you want to go back without saving the changes?"

elements.name: As a user, I should not be able to save profile information if no changes have been made on the profile editing page

steps.name: user has completed the onboarding steps and left notification enabled by default
user tap Profile on navigation bar

elements.name: As a user, I should be able to easily and securely reset my password via email

steps.name: user has completed the onboarding steps and left notification enabled by default
user is on the login page
user input a valid new password "iniPasswordStrong!12"
user input a valid confirm password "iniPasswordStrong!12"
display success message "Your password has been changed successfully!"
user successfully login with new password

elements.name: As a user, I should not be able to reset my password if confirm new password not same with new password

steps.name: user has completed the onboarding steps and left notification enabled by default
user is on the login page
user input a valid new password "iniPasswordStrong!12"
user input a invalid confirm password "iniPasswordStrong!21"
user stay on Set New Password page

elements.name: As a user, I should not be able to reset my password with invalid email

steps.name: user has completed the onboarding steps and left notification enabled by default
user is on the login page
display the alert message "Email Not Found"

elements.name: As a user, I should be able to access search feature and view ticket list as a guest

steps.name: user has completed the onboarding steps and left notification enabled by default
user is on the login page
user tap Login as a guest link
user select passengers and cabin class

elements.name: As a user, I should not be able to book a flight as a guest

steps.name: user has completed the onboarding steps and left notification enabled by default
user is on the login page
user tap Login as a guest link
display an alert message "You must sign in first to be able to use all the features"

arguments.val: "You must sign in first to be able to use all the features"
